channel.title: D3 on miracle of light
channel.description: Recent content in D3 on miracle of light

item.title: dart use
item.description: dart use d3.js import 'dart:html'; import 'package:js/js.dart' as js; void main() { var dee3 = js.context.d3; var dataset = js.array([ 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 ]); dee3.select("body").selectAll("p") .data(dataset) .enter() .append("p") .text((d, i, context) => d); }
